foreignKeyAttribute.name: accountManagerId

constantValues: Account manager responsible for the quote.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: contractOrganizationalUnitId

constantValues: The organizational unit in charge of the contract.

members.name: feasible

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows how the quote estimation compares to project estimation. Possible values are 0: Feasibility Not Available, 1: Feasible, and 2: Not Feasible.

members.description: Shows how the quote estimation compares to project estimation. Possible values are 0: Feasibility Not Available, 1: Feasible, and 2: Not Feasible.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'feasible_display' is added to the 'Quote' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'feasible'
addSupportingAttribute.name: feasible_display

members.name: orderType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Select whether the project contract is for an item-based or a work-based sale.

members.description: Select whether the project contract is for an item-based or a work-based sale.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'orderType_display' is added to the 'Quote' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'orderType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: orderType_display

members.name: adjustedGrossMargin

constantValues: Shows the estimated gross margin after accounting for non-chargeable components.

members.description: Shows the estimated gross margin after accounting for non-chargeable components.

members.name: competitive

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows how the quote estimation of sales value and schedule compare to customer expectations on those parameters. Possible values are 1: Within Customer expectations, 2: Not Within Customer expectations, and 0: Customer expectations Not Available.

members.description: Shows how the quote estimation of sales value and schedule compare to customer expectations on those parameters. Possible values are 1: Within Customer expectations, 2: Not Within Customer expectations, and 0: Customer expectations Not Available.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'competitive_display' is added to the 'Quote' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'competitive'
addSupportingAttribute.name: competitive_display

members.name: customerBudgetRollUp

constantValues: Shows the total customer budget for the quote, computed from all the quote lines.

members.description: Shows the total customer budget for the quote, computed from all the quote lines.

members.name: customerBudgetRollupBase

constantValues: Shows the value of the customer budget in the base currency.

members.description: Shows the value of the customer budget in the base currency.

members.name: estimatedBudget

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows how the estimated sales value on the quote compares to customer budgets. Possible values are 1: Within Customer Budget, 2: Exceeds Customer Budget, 0: Budget Estimate Not Available

members.description: Shows how the estimated sales value on the quote compares to customer budgets. Possible values are 1: Within Customer Budget, 2: Exceeds Customer Budget, 0: Budget Estimate Not Available

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'estimatedBudget_display' is added to the 'Quote' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'estimatedBudget'
addSupportingAttribute.name: estimatedBudget_display

members.name: estimatedCompletionRollUp

constantValues: Estimated completion date, computed from the details of each quote line.

members.description: Estimated completion date, computed from the details of each quote line.

members.name: estimatedSchedule

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows how the estimated schedule on the quote compares to customer expectations. Possible values are 1: Estimated To Finish Early, 2: Estimated To Finish Late, 3: Estimated To Finish On Schedule, and 0: Schedule Not Available.

members.description: Shows how the estimated schedule on the quote compares to customer expectations. Possible values are 1: Estimated To Finish Early, 2: Estimated To Finish Late, 3: Estimated To Finish On Schedule, and 0: Schedule Not Available.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'estimatedSchedule_display' is added to the 'Quote' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'estimatedSchedule'
addSupportingAttribute.name: estimatedSchedule_display

members.name: grossMargin

constantValues: Shows the estimated gross margin without accounting for non-chargeable components.

members.name: profitability

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows the estimated profitability of the quote. Possible values are Profitable, Not Profitable, and Profitability not available.
